DataElement.preferredName: Person Affective Oral Pain Weighted Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the weighted score for affective oral pain using word descriptors from the Painometer (POM).

DataElement.changeDescription: CDEs support the Pain-O-Meter (POM) measure of pain.  Permissible values should not be extended or changed.  CDEs curated for NCI CCR clinical trial.
